verbose_text: To substantiate the hypothesis that the AKT / mTOR associated pathway mediates apoptosis of the activated miR-9-5p / Klf4 axis in HCC cells, whether the cell proliferative capability is reinforced when AKT is inhibited was investigated.
evidence: AKT/mTOR-associated pathway mediates apoptosis of the activated miR-9-5p/Klf4
